Subject: US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (MN) - Government Letters 
Date: Thu, 22 Apr 2021 20:52:12 +0000 
Attachments: 2021-04-22 Gov't letter re GM re uest_for_adjoumment_FINAL.pdf; 2021-04-
22 -_request_to_file_under_seal.pdf 
Good afternoon, 
Attached please find a copy of the Government's letter response to the defense's motion for an adjournment of trial in 
the above-referenced case, which was just filed on ECF. 
In addition, attached please find a supplemental letter addressing the request for an adjournment, which the Government 
respectfully requests be filed under seal because it contains private medical information. 
Respectfully submitted, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00027080
